price: (13) They will not believe in it, while there has already occurred the precedent of the former peoples.
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi waqad khalat sunnatu al-awalīna
